1.title: Strangers

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

1.plot: The team trains in San Diego in preparation for tour. Brenda gives an amazing motivational speech to the whole group at the top of Mt. Soledad, and the roadies scatter across the nation.

2.title: Culture Shock

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

2.plot: Follow Benna and Brenda as they train in Uganda and prepare for culture shock, cold winters, and homesickness amongst other things in the States.

3.title: Stressed Out

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

3.plot: New York, New York. Angela visits her dad's old high school and is reminded of how much the tour reminds her of Nate.

4.title: Lack of Chemistry

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

4.plot: The team journeys into Massachusetts. Lack of communication lead to tense feelings as they learn to work things out. Adam is back in his hometown and shows the Ugandans his childhood hangouts.

5.title: Hairy Situation

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

5.plot: The team visits the Statue of Liberty. Angela questions Adam's leadership style. Will Angela step back and let Adam lead the group?

6.title: Seasons

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

6.plot: Fatigue starts to set in as the tour wears on, but the roadies take time to enjoy the turning leaves of a New England fall.

7.title: Oh! Canada!

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

7.plot: The team experiences some unexpected setbacks while crossing the Canadian border in the middle of the night. They are faced with language and cultural barriers while trying to share their story.

8.title: The White Stuff

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

8.plot: Snow! Brenda and Benna play in snow for the first time in Upstate New York. The roadies question if they can come back for another tour while Angela struggles with the loss of her teammate.

9.title: Cutting it Close

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

9.plot: The tour ends in New York and the team is faced with a race to cross the country and get back to San Diego. They have a few short weeks to reach their $144,000 goal. The Ugandans leave in a dramatic departure.

10.title: Friends?

episode of.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (TV Series 2011– )

10.plot: With less than two weeks remaining can Invisible Children make their $1,000,000 goal? Are the friendships still intact after 10 weeks on the road or will they part ways on bad terms?

imdb.title: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour
akas: Roadworthy: The Invisible Children Tour (United States)
plot: Documenting the adventures of millennial youth, whose desire for individual purpose melds with the corporate purpose of Invisible Children, as they discover that world peace comes with personal sacrifice.::Halogen TV
